personalInfo.name: Yusuf Topkaya
personalInfo.about: As a Software Engineer at VeriPark, I have a strong foundation in computer science and a passion for creating innovative software solutions.

projects.title: Türk Eximbank Internet Banking
projects.description: Türk Eximbank Internet Banking is a web application that allows corporate customers to manage their accounts and transactions online.

projects.title: Akbank AG Internet Banking
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive internet banking solution for Akbank AG Germany, enabling corporate and retail customers to securely manage their banking operations. The platform offers features like account management, fund transfers, and digital banking services with a user-friendly interface.

projects.title: Garanti BBVA Romania Onboarding
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive onboarding solution for Garanti BBVA Romania, enabling corporate customers to securely manage their banking operations.
